system.effect: As Free Action, captain can decrease generated power (P) to increase speed (S). Frigate/Raider: (3P-->1S), Light cruiser: (4P-->1S), Cruiser/Transport (5P-->1S). Can divert as much power as you have, included from other components, which depowers them. One per vessel.
